briefdescription.para: Creates a new QgsTransformEffect effect from a properties string map.
Constructor for QgsTransformEffect.
Duplicates an effect by creating a deep copy of the effect.
Returns the properties describing the paint effect encoded in a string format.

simplesect.para: string map of properties, in the form property key, value

briefdescription.para: Reads a string map of an effect's properties and restores the effect to the state described by the properties map.

parameterdescription.para: effect properties encoded in a string map

briefdescription.para: Returns whether transform will be reflected along the x-axis.

simplesect.para: true if transform will reflect horizontally

briefdescription.para: Returns whether transform will be reflected along the y-axis.

simplesect.para: true if transform will reflect horizontally

briefdescription.para: Returns the transform rotation, in degrees clockwise.
Returns the x axis scaling factor.

simplesect.para: x axis scaling factor, where 1.0 = no scaling

briefdescription.para: Returns the y axis scaling factor.

simplesect.para: y axis scaling factor, where 1.0 = no scaling

briefdescription.para: Sets whether to reflect along the x-axis.
Sets whether to reflect along the y-axis.
Sets the transform rotation, in degrees clockwise.
Sets the x axis scaling factor.

parameterdescription.para: factor to scale x axis by, where 1.0 = no scaling

briefdescription.para: Sets the y axis scaling factor.

parameterdescription.para: factor to scale y axis by, where 1.0 = no scaling

briefdescription.para: Sets the x axis shearing factor.
Sets the y axis shearing factor.
Sets the map unit scale used for the transform translation.
Sets the units used for the transform translation.
Sets the transform x translation.

parameterdescription.para: distance to translate along the x axis

briefdescription.para: Sets the transform y translation.

parameterdescription.para: distance to translate along the y axis

briefdescription.para: Returns the x axis shearing factor.
Returns the y axis shearing factor.
Returns the map unit scale used for the transform translation.
Returns the units used for the transform translation.
Returns the transform x translation.

simplesect.para: X distance translated along the x axis

briefdescription.para: Returns the transform y translation.

simplesect.para: Y distance translated along the y axis

briefdescription.para: Returns the effect type.

simplesect.para: unique string representation of the effect type

briefdescription.para: Returns the bounding rect required for drawing the effect.

detaileddescription.para:
This method can be used to expand the bounding rect of a source picture to account for offset or blurring effects.
rect
original source bounding rect
context
destination render context
modified bounding rect
sourceAsImage

briefdescription.para: Handles drawing of the effect's result on to the specified render context.

detaileddescription.para:
Derived classes must reimplement this method to apply any transformations to the source QPicture and draw the result using the context's painter.
context
destination render context
drawSource

briefdescription.para: A paint effect which applies transformations (such as move, scale and rotate) to a picture.
